overview: Momok I is a horror film that combines several ghost stories in one film that is Pontianak, Penunggu, Kucing Hitam, Pocong and Bunian. This story is a mere fabrication and has nothing to do with those who are still alive or who have died. If there are any similarities, it is not intentional and happened by chance. Hope you are all entertained.
tagline: Kelip-kelip kusangka api, Jika api di mana panasnya ?, Hilang ghaib kusangka mati, Kalau mati di mana kuburnya ?
title: Momok I
